string.name: wp_share_everywhere_title
string.context: Title for Share Everywhere springboard button, which launches the Share Everywhere activity and title for Share Everywhere activity.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_description_title
string.context: Title for the description of the Share Everywhere activity, which explains how the feature works to end users.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_description_text
string.context: Text for the description of the Share Everywhere activity, which explains how the feature works to end users. %1$@ is the brand name of the portal.

resources.string: Accorder un accès unique et limité aux informations de santé disponibles dans %1$@, qui pourraient comprendre:

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_medications_label
string.context: Label for medications, in the context of being available via Share Everywhere.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_health_issues_label
string.context: Label for health issues, in the context of being available via Share Everywhere.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_allergies_label
string.context: Label for allergies, in the context of being available via Share Everywhere.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_immunizations_label
string.context: Label for immunizations, in the context of being available via Share Everywhere.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_write_note_label
string.context: Label for the ability to write a note to the patient's chart, in the context of being available via Share Everywhere.

resources.string: La personne qui accède à votre dossier pourra aussi écrire une note clinique à votre équipe soignante.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_request_token_button_title
string.context: Title for button to request a share token for Share Everywhere.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_active_token_title
string.context: Title for Share Everywhere token card, which contains an active Share Token and instructions on how to use it.

resources.string: Vous pouvez maintenant partager votre dossier médical.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_active_token_instructions
string.context: Instructions for using an active Share Token. %1$@ is the name of the person who's accessing the record. %2$@ is the website URL where the Token can be exchanged.

resources.string: %1$@ peut maintenant se rendre sur %2$@ et saisir le code de partage ci-dessous pour accéder à votre dossier.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_dismiss_token_button_title
string.context: Appears as the text on a button in the Share Everywhere screen after a user generates a share code. A user can tap on the button displaying this text to delete and remove the Share Everywhere code

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_token_expiration
string.context: Label indicating how much time remains until the active Share Token expires.

resources.string: Le code de partage expirera dans %1$@

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_alert_title
string.context: Title for Share Everywhere request alert, which prompts the user for more info before requesting a new Share Token.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_alert_message
string.context: Message for Share Everywhere request alert, which prompts the user for more info before requesting a new Share Token.

resources.string: Veuillez saisir le nom de la personne qui accédera à votre dossier de santé.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_alert_edittext_hint
string.context: Placeholder text for the name that the user must enter when requesting a new Share Token.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_alert_button_request
string.context: Title for the button on the Share Everywhere request alert that completes the request for a new Share Token.

string.name: wp_share_everywhere_alert_button_cancel
string.context: Title for the button on the Share Everywhere request alert that cancels the request.
